Class EarthquakeMarker

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.AbstractMarker
      • de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.SimplePointMarker

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.Marker
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LandQuakeMarker, OceanQuakeMarker

    public abstract class EarthquakeMarker
extends de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.SimplePointMarker
    Implements a visual marker for earthquakes on an earthquake map
    Author:
    UC San Diego Intermediate Software Development MOOC team, Your name here
